snippet: The founder of Gideon’s Promise, which trains lawyers to provide defense counsel to the indigent, responds to a Sunday Observer.
lead_paragraph: The founder of Gideon’s Promise, which trains lawyers to provide defense counsel to the indigent, responds to a Sunday Observer.

headline.main: Public Defenders, 50 Years After the Gideon Ruling
headline.print_headline: Public Defenders, 50 Years After the Gideon Ruling
